name: Stagger Text Reveal
description: Letters stagger in with scale and opacity
code: gsap.fromTo('.letter', { y: 100, opacity: 0 }, { y: 0, opacity: 1, duration: 0.8, ease: 'power4.out', stagger: 0.05 });

name: 3D Flip Card
code: gsap.to(card, { rotationY: 180, duration: 0.8, ease: 'power2.inOut', transformPerspective: 1000 });

name: Magnetic Button
description: Button follows cursor with smooth magnet effect
code: gsap.to(btn, { x: xMove * 0.4, y: yMove * 0.4, ease: 'power3.out' });

name: ScrollTrigger Pin & Scale
description: Pin section and scale up while scrolling
code: gsap.to('.box', { scale: 2, scrollTrigger: { trigger: '.box', pin: true, scrub: true } });

name: SVG Morph
code: gsap.to('#path1', { morphSVG: '#path2', duration: 1.5, ease: 'elastic.out(1,0.5)' });

name: Horizontal Scroll Gallery
description: Pin and scroll horizontally through panels
code: gsap.to('.panel', { xPercent: -100 * (panels.length - 1), scrollTrigger: { trigger: '.container', pin: true, scrub: 1 } });

name: Parallax Hero
code: gsap.to('.layer', { yPercent: -speed * 100, ease: 'none', scrollTrigger: { trigger: '.hero', scrub: true } });

name: Draw SVG Stroke
code: gsap.fromTo(path, { strokeDashoffset: length }, { strokeDashoffset: 0, scrollTrigger: { trigger: path, scrub: true } });

name: Cursor Trail Blob
code: gsap.to('.blob', { x: { x: mouseX, y: mouseY, ease: 'power3.out' });

name: Timeline Sequence
code: const tl = gsap.timeline(); tl.to('.box', { x: 300 }).to('.box', { rotation: 360 }).to('.box', { scale: 0 });

name: Counter Up
code: gsap.to(counter, { innerHTML: endValue, duration: 2, snap: { innerHTML: 1 }, ease: 'power2.out' });

name: Image Mask Reveal
description: Image revealed through expanding circle mask
code: gsap.to('.mask', { scale: 15, duration: 1.8, ease: 'power4.inOut' });

name: Floating Particles
code: gsap.to(particles, { y: 'random(-30, 30)', x: 'random(-20, 20)', rotation: 'random(-180, 180)', repeat: -1, yoyo: true, stagger: 0.2 });

name: Smooth Page Transition
code: gsap.to('.transition-overlay', { x: '100%', duration: 1, ease: 'power4.inOut' });

name: Text Scramble Effect
code: gsap.to('.scramble', { duration: 2, text: 'Hello World', ease: 'none', scramble: true });

name: 3D Tilt Card on Hover
code: gsap.to(card, { rotationY: tiltX * 20, rotationX: -tiltY * 20, scale: 1.05, ease: 'power2.out' });

name: Liquid Button
code: gsap.to('feGaussianBlur', { attr: { stdDeviation: 10 }, duration: 0.6 });

name: Progress Bar Fill
description: Smooth animated progress bar with trail
code: gsap.to('.progress', { width: '100%', duration: 3, ease: 'power3.inOut' });

name: Clip-Path Reveal
code: gsap.to(el, { clipPath: 'polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 100%, 0 100%)', duration: 1.5, ease: 'power4.out' });

name: Draggable Carousel
code: Draggable.create('.carousel', { type: 'x', bounds: container, inertia: true });

name: Fade In Sections
description: Sections fade & slide in on scroll
code: gsap.from('.section', { y: 80, opacity: 0, duration: 1, scrollTrigger: { trigger: '.section', start: 'top 85%' } });

name: Split Text Lines
description: Reveal text line by line with stagger
code: gsap.from(split.lines, { y: 120, opacity: 0, stagger: 0.1, duration: 1.2, ease: 'power3.out' });

name: Color Changing Navbar
code: ScrollTrigger.create({ trigger: section, onEnter: () => gsap.to(nav, { backgroundColor: color }) });

name: Rotating 3D Globe
code: gsap.to('.globe', { rotationY: '+=360', duration: 30, repeat: -1, ease: 'none' });

name: Neon Glow Text
code: gsap.to('.neon', { textShadow: '0 0 30px #0ff, 0 0 60px #0ff', duration: 0.1, repeat: -1, yoyo: true });
